hibernate-mapping.query: insert into CustomerCustomFieldEntity (customer, fieldId, fieldValue) select customer, defEntity.fieldId, defEntity.defaultValue from org.mifos.customers.business.CustomerBO as customer, org.mifos.application.master.business.CustomFieldDefinitionEntity as defEntity where customer.customerLevel.id = :levelId and defEntity.fieldId = :fieldId
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT a.customer_customfield_id, a.field_id, a.field_value, b.created_date, b.updated_date, b.updated_date, b.created_by, b.updated_by, b.customer_id FROM customer_custom_field a join customer b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id where a.field_id = :CUSTOM_FIELD_ID
